recipe_name: Apple sponge pudding with toffee sauce
author: Tony Tobin
method: Pre-heat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Peel and slice the apple into wedges. Melt the butter and sugar in an oven-proof frying pan. Cook until golden. Add the apple wedges. For the pudding, mix together the flour, butter, sugar, egg and milk to form a smooth paste. Place the mixture on top of the apples place into an oven proof frying pan and place in the oven and cook for 8-10 minutes. For the toffee sauce, melt the butter and sugar for four minutes slowly add the cream. Serve with the apple sponge pudding.
ingredients: 1 apple,  75g/2¾oz butter,  75g/2¾oz sugar,  75g/2¾oz self raising flour ,  25g/1oz butter,  25g/1oz brown sugar,  1 egg,  25ml/1fl oz milk,  75g/2¾oz butter,  75g/2½oz dark brown sugar,  100ml /3½fl oz double cream
